data.chText: 自动扶梯；电动楼梯；滚梯
data.enText: moving stairs that carry people between different floors of a large building

simple_means.memory_skill: escal 梯子 + ator 表名词 → 自动扶梯

tr: a stairway whose steps move continuously on a circulating belt
a clause in a contract that provides for an increase or a decrease in wages or prices or benefits etc. depending on certain conditions (as a change in the cost of living index)

value.def: An escalator is a moving staircase on which people can go from one level of a building to another.

partsOfSpeech.dec: escal 梯子 + ade 动作 → 爬梯子的动作 → 攀登
escal 梯子 + ate 做，造成，使… → 爬梯子使人逐步上升 → 逐步上升
escalat〔e〕逐步上升 + ion 动作或状态 → 逐步上升；逐步增强
escal 梯子 + ator 表名词 → 自动扶梯
